comment: Bourbon is not as complex as  say Scotch.  However  anything 20 years old has to have some character. It does. Really smooth. Caramel ,Vanilla , slight cinnamon. Even burn from start to finish.  I enjoyed it very much.
This is one of the best.  Sweet but not to sweet with the right amount of burn!
Honey and citrus notes with maple and nutmeg. Perfect for fall

Very enjoyable nose
Balanced palate
Sweet but not too sweet 
All the typical bourbon notes 
Nice finish
tried at hundred north in gilbert. nose wheat, cinnamon, oak. flavor cinnamon, toast toffee.

*drank out of a rocks glass

Nose: Even out of a rocks glass the nose the nose was amazing. I could just spend all day nosing it. lightly sweet caramel, brown sugar, vanilla. no alcohol/ethanol

palate: spicy like a stick of big red gum but more cinnamon forward. despite the spicy wood flavor it doesn't bite and drinks very smooth.
